ValidationRule.description: Forecast Categories (Upside, Risk, Secure, RoP) cannot have Periods selected which end date is in the past(Req:186).06-10-2017 AJ: Req.#2897, Added bypass in Validation to allow old period OIF line creation for Upsell Opportunity at G5 gate confirmation.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name<> $Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name, OR(AND(ISNEW(), Opportunity__r.Is_Auto_Upsell__c <> true),ISCHANGED(Forecast_Category__c), ISCHANGED( POPlanReceipt__c)), OR(ISPICKVAL( Forecast_Category__c , "Risk"),ISPICKVAL( Forecast_Category__c, "Upside"),ISPICKVAL( Forecast_Category__c, "Secure"), ISPICKVAL( Forecast_Category__c, "ROP"), ISPICKVAL( Forecast_Category__c, "Excluded")), POPlanReceipt__r.End_Date__c < Today(), Allocation__c = false )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: An open OIF line cannot have a past PO Plan / Receipt period. Please change period or Forecast Category.
